description: This file is an HTML webpage that provides a user interface for visualizing databases and their data. It includes styling, layout, and client-side JavaScript logic for fetching and displaying database lists, tables, and table data interactively.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the database sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by re-fetching data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles user interaction to expand or collapse database entries and load their tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and renders the data of a selected table from the database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data in a structured format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML considering object and long text content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles the expansion/collapse of cell content for long text or objects.
